parameters.name: NumberOfDays
parameters.label: Number of Days
parameters.description: Select range of days to query

parameters.name: ManagementIP
parameters.label: Management IP
parameters.query:
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:login" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:access" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:suspicious") |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) |
where DeviceAddress != "" |
summarize count() by DeviceAddress | 
project DeviceAddress

content.query:
let binSize = iff({NumberOfDays} > 1, 1d, 1h);
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:login" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:access" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:suspicious")|
where Message !contains "hasForensics" |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) | 
where "{ManagementIP}" contains "All" or "{ManagementIP}" contains DeviceAddress |
extend DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2) |
summarize by bin(TimeGenerated,binSize) ,DeviceCustomNumber2 |
make-series event_count=count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range (ago({NumberOfDays}d), now(), binSize) |
mvexpand TimeGenerated, event_count |
project todatetime(TimeGenerated), toint(event_count)
content.title: Incidents over time

content.query:
let binSize = iff({NumberOfDays} > 1, 1d, 1h);
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:login" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:access" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:suspicious")|
where Message !contains "hasForensics" |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) | 
where "{ManagementIP}" contains "All" or "{ManagementIP}" contains DeviceAddress |
summarize by bin(TimeGenerated,binSize) ,ExternalID |
make-series event_count=count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range (ago({NumberOfDays}d), now(), binSize) |
mvexpand TimeGenerated, event_count |
project todatetime(TimeGenerated), toint(event_count)
content.title: Events over time

content.query:
let binSize = iff({NumberOfDays} > 1, 1d, 1h);
union CommonSecurityLog 
| extend DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2)
 | where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:login" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:access" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:suspicious")|
where Message !contains "hasForensics" |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) | 
where "{ManagementIP}" contains "All" or "{ManagementIP}" contains DeviceAddress |
summarize by DestinationServiceName ,DeviceCustomNumber2 |
summarize incident_count=count() by DestinationServiceName
content.title: Number of Incidents in which Trigger Type is found

content.query:
union CommonSecurityLog 
| extend DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2)|
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:login" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:access" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:suspicious")|
where Message !contains "hasForensics" |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) | 
where "{ManagementIP}" contains "All" or "{ManagementIP}" contains DeviceAddress |
summarize by DeviceEventClassID ,DeviceCustomNumber2 |
summarize incident_count=count() by DeviceEventClassID
content.title: Number of Incidents in which Event Type is found

content.query:
union CommonSecurityLog|  
extend DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2)|
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:login" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:access" or DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:suspicious")|
where Message !contains "hasForensics" |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) | 
where "{ManagementIP}" contains "All" or "{ManagementIP}" contains DeviceAddress |
summarize by AlertingHost=iff(SourceHostName != "" and SourceHostName != "Failed to obtain", SourceHostName, SourceIP)   ,DeviceCustomNumber2 |
where AlertingHost != "" and AlertingHost != "Failed to obtain" |
summarize incident_count=count() by AlertingHost |
order by incident_count |
limit 10
content.title: Top 10 alerting hosts
